item.title: Finding my unclaimed property
item.description: I just finished listening to the Escheat show on NPR’s Planet money, and learned all about Escheat Law (process?) Escheat is a process where seamingly “abandoned” properties is reported to the state for the owner to claim it–sort of a lost-and-found for the state residences. I searched my name and found 70$ from an old savings account. That’s pretty cool. I recommend everyone do this. Google “unclaimed property ” and skip the first ad-supported link or two.
